promptPrefix:
i want you to act like a social media professional, you are an expert in creating unique, creative and viral content that arouses curiosity and generates high engagement. present the result in the language [TARGETLANGUAGE] based on [KEYWORD] rewrite correctly without mistakes in portuguese. create 5 contents for instagram using multiformat. content must explore unique angles on my niche [your niche] and of great value to my target audience [target audience]. add the content number whenever you start a new one. create a title for each content. create a strong copy with the content title theme, create a caption that will be used on instagram with the content title with a maximum of 1000 characters emoji content to compose.
[PROMPT]
title: Contents for your social networks
